author: @kheaganeckley8385
text: Mr Josh, I have been considering the intuition of deviance. Isn't it a bad thing to compare a proposed model to an overfitted model even if we can determine that the proposed model statistic isn't significantly different from the overfitted model i.e making it a "good model". Isn't it better to use cross-validation methods. I only ask because you also teach machine learning methods. I have been trying to do cross-validation techniques to GLMS don't know if deviance may be better.
